LanguageData.N7_NoRawMudbrickFound: No wet mudbrick of that kind found in this map.
LanguageData.N7_StartInsertionRawMudbrickDesc: Bring wet mudbrick to start drying.
LanguageData.N7_WaitTillJobsEndRawMudbrick: Wait until the wet mudbrick has been delivered, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.N7_DriedMudbrickInProgress: Drying rack is drying {0}. It will be ready in {1}
LanguageData.N7_DriedMudbrickReady: The mudbrick is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.N7_RawMudbrickImproperlyDefined: The mudbrick has been improperly defined to work. Contact the mod's author.
LanguageData.N7_RemoveDriedMudbrickDesc: Remove dried mudbrick from the drying rack.
LanguageData.N7_BrickDryingRackEmpty: Drying rack is empty right now
LanguageData.N7_RainWarning: Warning: This process is sensitive to the rain.
LanguageData.N7_IsRainWarning: Warning: Rainfall will destroy Mud Brick processing.
LanguageData.N7_InsertUnfiredBrickDesc: Select unfired brick to fire on the kiln.
LanguageData.N7_NoUnfiredBrickFound: No unfired brick of that kind found in this map.
LanguageData.N7_StartInsertionUnfiredBrickDesc: Bring unfired brick to the kiln to start fireing.
LanguageData.N7_RemoveUnfiredBrickDesc: Remove the unfired brick from the kiln.
LanguageData.N7_CancelBringingUnfiredBrickDesc: Cancel bringing unfired brick to the kiln.
LanguageData.N7_WaitTillJobsEndUnfiredBrick: Wait until the unfired brick has been brought to the kiln, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.N7_EngageUnfiredBrickDesc: Start fireing brick. This process takes about a day and a half.
LanguageData.N7_FiredBrickFinished: Brick has finished fireing in the kiln
LanguageData.N7_FiredBrickInProgress: Kiln is fireing {0}. It will be ready in {1}
LanguageData.N7_FiredBrickReady: The brick is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.N7_UnfiredBrickImproperlyDefined: The brick has been improperly defined to work with the kiln. Contact the mod's author.
LanguageData.N7_RemoveFiredBrickDesc: Remove fired brick from the kiln.
LanguageData.N7_NoPowerDestroy: Do to power outage this process is lost.
LanguageData.N7_TempRangeInThisMachine: . This process needs a temperature between {0} and {1} degrees {2}
LanguageData.N7_InsertRawClayDesc: Select clay to mix in the extruder.
LanguageData.N7_InsertSandDesc: Select sand to mix in the extruder.
LanguageData.N7_CancelBringingclayDesc: Cancel bringing clay and sand to the extruder.
LanguageData.N7_RemoveUnfiredBrickDesc: Remove unfired brick from the extruder.
LanguageData.N7_StartInsertionClayDesc: Bring clay and sand to the extruder to start mixing.
LanguageData.N7_NoClayFound: No clay of that kind found in this map.
LanguageData.N7_NoSandFound: No sand of that kind found in this map.
LanguageData.GizmoDescriptionClay: Have the Clay Pit mine Clay.
LanguageData.GizmoDescriptionSand: Have the Clay Pit mine Sand.
LanguageData.N7_BringIngredientsDesc: Extract ingredients from adjacent hoppers to start the process
LanguageData.GizmoDescriptionSandTrap: Have the Sand Collector trap Sand.
